metadata.name: !!miniMAPI
metadata.description:
A mod that provides an easy to use API for editing the minimap of the game, while also providing a lot of customization features for the player itself.
[h1][b]Features:[/b][/h1] - Dynamically resizable minimap - Over 50 new unique custom icons for pickups, slot machines and beggars - Highly configurable: Turn on/off parts of the minimap, like shadows or icons - Smooth minimap movement (1.0 is instant, 0.1 is very slow) - New map mode: Small full map (display all rooms in small form!) - Powerful API that allows a lot of manipulation of the minimap - Add Map Curse Icons (restock, curses) - And loads of other QoL improvements
[h1][b]Planned Features:[/b][/h1] - Change position of the Map Curse icons (left, bottom[vanilla]) - Add pickup display config options: (One pickup per item group, one pickup per corresponding icon, show all) - Draw new pickup icons (where applicable): -- Trapdoor/ladder (Grid Entity icons not implemented) - Hovering over a room will display a list of its contents (Thanks JSG!)
[h1][b]if you see two minimaps, restart your game![/b][/h1]
[h1]Special Thanks:[/h1] - Kittenchilly and Mewlala for helping on development of this mod - Chinpokomon_ for the White Fireplace Icon
